posts.post_content: hmmm it's black, so the mana cost is high for a good quality creature, not good old stinky here. 1 mana gives u flying, 1 mana gives a 1/2, one mana gives u death touch. lure doesn't work on this unless u ramp up stinky's front end. and on top of the moderate mana cost it has dredge 5. that is not a draw back for u can choose not to dredge, definitely a 5 star card
